com.ge.healthcare.dose.services.ruleengine

Interface Rule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRule

    public interface Rule
extends Runnable

    The Rule interface is the basic entity description to be managed by all the RuleProcessor process.

    It provides 2 main methods signatures :
    • evaluate() to detect if this rule can match with trigger condition,
    • process() to appluy any change to any data according to the fact this rule is triggered.

    This Rule is managed by the RuleProcessor#process(String, JsonObject) method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      boolean evaluate(RuleContext rc, com.google.gson.JsonObject obj)
      the evaluate method purpose consists in rule trigger evaluation.
      String getName() 
      int process(RuleContext rc, com.google.gson.JsonObject obj)

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()

      • evaluate

        boolean evaluate(RuleContext rc,
                 com.google.gson.JsonObject obj)

        the evaluate method purpose consists in rule trigger evaluation. If true, the rule process method will be executed by the RuleProcessor.

        Parameters:
        rc - the RuleContext to help and feed evaluate the trigger
        obj - the object to be evaluated regarding rule context.
        Returns:

      • process

        int process(RuleContext rc,
            com.google.gson.JsonObject obj)

        The process to be apply when this rule is triggered.

        Parameters:
        rc - the execution RuleContext to be used as an input/output gateway.
        obj - the object to be processed.
        Returns:
        an int value corresponding to an error code. 0 is OK, any other error will be evaluate as an error code.
